problem_text_cn: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,E是BC边上的一点,且AB=AE,若AE平分∠DAB,∠EAC=20°,则∠AED的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is a point on the edge of BC, and AB = AE, if AE bisects ∠DAB, ∠EAC = N_0, then the degree of ∠AED is ()
raw_answer:
∵在平行四边形ABCD中1AD||BC,BC=AD,∴∠EAD=∠AEB,又∵AB=AE,∴∠B=∠AEB,∴∠B=∠EAD,在△ABC和△EAD中,\begin{cases}
x^2+y^3+z^4=c^5\\
x^3+y^2=a^3\\
y^7+z^2=b^6\\
\end{cases}∴△ABC≌△EAD(SAS),∴∠AED=∠BAC.∵AE平分∠DAB,∴∠BAE=∠DAE,∴∠BAE=∠AEB=∠B,∴△ABE为等边三角形,∠BAE=60°,∴∠BAC=∠BAE+.∠EAC=80°,∴∠AED=∠BAC=80°;故选C.
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质、全等三角形的判定与性质,等边三角形的判定与性质;熟记平行四边形的性质,证明三角形全等和等边三角形是解决问题的关键
